KPK Tepis Imam Nahrawi: Penetapan Tersangka Sudah Sesuai Prosedur
05 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Mantan Menpora Imam Nahrawi meminta status tersangkanya dibatalkan dalam kasus dugaan suap terkait dana hibah KONI. KPK menegaskan penetapan tersangka Imam Nahrawi tersebut sudah sesuai prosedur.
"KPK mendapatkan bukti permulaan yang cukup atau minimal 2 alat bukti, sesuai Pasal 44 UU KPK, maka dapat dilakukan penyidikan," kata Kabiro Humas KPK, Febri Diansyah saat dihubungi detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).
Dalam sidang praperadilan, pengacara Imam Nahrawi, Saleh menilai penetapan tersangka terhadap dirinya oleh KPK tidak sesuai prosedur. Saleh menyebut belum ada pemeriksaan saksi-saksi sebelum dikeluarkannya sprindik tanggal 28 Agustus 2019.
Kembali ke KPK, Febri menyatakan pihaknya sudah menemukan bukti permulaan untuk menetapkan tersangka Imam Nahrawi.
"Jika frasa bukti permulaan yang cukup tersebut dihubungkan dengan ketentuan pada Pasal 1 angka 14 KUHAP yang mengatur defenisi Tersangka adalah seorang yang karena perbuatannya atau keadaannya, berdasarkan bukti permulaan patut diduga sebagai pelaku tindak pidana, maka sejak proses penyidikan, karena telah ditemukan bukti permulaan yang cukup, sekaligus dapat ditetapkan tersangka. Ketentuan yang bersifat khusus ini memang seringkali tidak dipahami secara tepat sehingga para pemohon berulang kali menggunakan argumentasi tersebut," kata dia.

KPK Tepis Imam Nahrawi: Determination of the Suspect Already in Accordance with the Procedure
05 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Former Menpora Imam Nahrawi has asked that the status of the suspect be canceled in the case of alleged bribery related to KONI's grant funds. The KPK stressed that the determination of the Imam Nahrawi suspect was in accordance with procedures.
"The Corruption Eradication Commission gets sufficient initial evidence or at least 2 pieces of evidence, according to Article 44 of the Corruption Eradication Commission Act, an investigation can be carried out," said the KPK Public Relations Commissioner, Febri Diansyah when contacted by AFP on Monday (11/04/2019).
In the pretrial hearing, lawyer Nah Nahrawi, Saleh considered the determination of the suspect against him by the KPK was not according to procedure. Saleh said there had not been an examination of witnesses before the sprindik was issued on August 28, 2019.
Returning to the KPK, Febri stated that his party had found preliminary evidence to establish the suspect Imam Nahrawi.
"If the adequate initial evidence phrase is connected with the provisions in Article 1 number 14 of the Criminal Procedure Code that defines the Defendant is a person who because of his actions or circumstances, based on preliminary evidence should be suspected as a criminal offense, then since the investigation process, because the preliminary evidence has been found "enough, at the same time a suspect can be determined. These special provisions are often not properly understood so that the applicant repeatedly uses these arguments," he said.
